<<<<<<< HEAD
The practice of thankefulnesse; or Davids choyse directions how to prayse God In an exposition and application vpon the whole sixtie sixe Psalme. With a short treatise vpon the thirtie one, and thirtie two verses of the one hundred and seuenth psalme. [Larke, Nicholas]
[8], 94 p.
printed by G. P[urslowe]. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop, neere to the Conduit in Fleet-street, London : 1622.
Printer's name from STC. Caption title on p. 1: An exposition of the sixtie sixe Psalme, by doctrine and examination. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
=======

[8], 94 p.
printed by G. P[urslowe]. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop, neere to the Conduit in Fleet-street, London : 1622.
